question: But the solar ______ is not just about planets.
Terrestrial planets like Earth, Venus, and Mars display rocky, rugged landscapes with solid, ______ surfaces, offering glimpses into the tumultuous history of our solar system.
before: Terrestrial planets like Earth, Venus, and Mars display rocky, rugged landscapes with solid,
after: surfaces, offering glimpses into the tumultuous history of our solar system.
